archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.1.5f: f) synchronise clocks to an approved time source (e.g. using the Network Time Protocol (NTP), supported by global positioning system (GPS), atomic clocks or approved time servers on the internet).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
